name: iScout - FM 2017 Football Player Scout
description:
iScout is The Only Scouting App With;
- More than 10.000 players*
- Filter by potential rating, sale value, age etc. (see more.)
- Average ratings of players in the 2016 - 2017 season simulated with iScout algorithm.
You can filter players by**;
- Position
- Side
- Age
- Rating
- Value
- Potential Rating
- Sale Value
Detailed player cards contains*;
- Current Rating
- Potential Rating
- Team And Nationality
- No of International Caps
- Player Value
- Player Sale Value
- Wage Per Week
- Date of Contract End
- Minimum Fee Release Clause
- Difference Between Current and Potential Rating
- Average Ratings of Players In The 2016 - 2017 Season Simulated with iScout Algorithm
- Potential Rating to Price Ratio
- Difference Between Sale Value and The Value
- iScout Report Stars *****
- Shortlist to save your favorite players.
- Simulated average ratings with more than 90% accuracy**

*We are open to recommendations, contact us and if possible iScout will be upgraded according to feedbacks from avid FM Players.
**(injuries are included in calculations and assumed that player has played more than 25 games in 2016-2017 season)
